panels.description:
![Cisco UCS Architecture](/public/img/utm/ucs_architecture.png)
UTM collector - v$utm_collector_ver  
UTM GUI - v0.52  
by Paresh Gupta

options.content: UTM - UCS Traffic Monitoring

flowcharts.csv:
## See more information for the syntax at https://drawio-app.com/import-from-csv-to-drawio/ ## ## Example CSV. Use ## for comments and # for configuration. ## The following names are reserved and should not be used (or ignored): ## id, tooltip, placeholder(s), link and label (see below) ## # ## Node label with placeholders and HTML. ## Default is '%name_of_first_column%'. # # label: %name%
%position%
Email # ## Node style (placeholders are replaced once). ## Default is the current style for nodes. # # style: label;image=%image%;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;fillColor=%fill%;strokeColor=%stroke%; # ## Parent style for nodes with child nodes (placeholders are replaced once). # # parentstyle: swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;childLayout=stackLayout;horizontal=1;horizontalStack=0;resizeParent=1;resizeLast=0;collapsible=1; # ## Optional column name that contains a reference to a named style in styles. ## Default is the current style for nodes. # # stylename: - # ## JSON for named styles of the form {"name": "style", "name": "style"} where style is a cell style with ## placeholders that are replaced once. # # styles: - # ## Optional column name that contains a reference to a named label in labels. ## Default is the current label. # # labelname: - # ## JSON for named labels of the form {"name": "label", "name": "label"} where label is a cell label with ## placeholders. # # labels: - # ## Uses the given column name as the identity for cells (updates existing cells). ## Default is no identity (empty value or -). # # identity: - # ## Uses the given column name as the parent reference for cells. Default is no parent (empty or -). ## The identity above is used for resolving the reference so it must be specified. # # parent: - # ## Adds a prefix to the identity of cells to make sure they do not collide with existing cells (whose ## IDs are numbers from 0..n, sometimes with a GUID prefix in the context of realtime collaboration). ## Default is csvimport-. # # namespace: csvimport- # ## Connections between rows ("from": source colum, "to": target column). ## Label, style and invert are optional. Defaults are '', current style and false. ## If placeholders are used in the style, they are replaced with data from the source. ## An optional placeholders can be set to target to use data from the target instead. ## In addition to label, an optional fromlabel and tolabel can be used to name the column ## that contains the text for the label in the edges source or target (invert ignored). ## The label is concatenated in the form fromlabel + label + tolabel if all are defined. ## The target column may contain a comma-separated list of values. ## Multiple connect entries are allowed. # # connect: {"from": "manager", "to": "name", "invert": true, "label": "manages", \ # "style": "curved=1;endArrow=blockThin;endFill=1;fontSize=11;"} # connect: {"from": "refs", "to": "id", "style": "curved=1;fontSize=11;"} # ## Node x-coordinate. Possible value is a column name. Default is empty. Layouts will ## override this value. # # left: # ## Node y-coordinate. Possible value is a column name. Default is empty. Layouts will ## override this value. # # top: # ## Node width. Possible value is a number (in px), auto or an @ sign followed by a column ## name that contains the value for the width. Default is auto. # # width: auto # ## Node height. Possible value is a number (in px), auto or an @ sign followed by a column ## name that contains the value for the height. Default is auto. # # height: auto # ## Padding for autosize. Default is 0. # # padding: -12 # ## Comma-separated list of ignored columns for metadata. (These can be ## used for connections and styles but will not be added as metadata.) # # ignore: id,image,fill,stroke,refs,manager # ## Column to be renamed to link attribute (used as link). # # link: url # ## Spacing between nodes. Default is 40. # # nodespacing: 40 # ## Spacing between levels of hierarchical layouts. Default is 100. # # levelspacing: 100 # ## Spacing between parallel edges. Default is 40. Use 0 to disable. # # edgespacing: 40 # ## Name or JSON of layout. Possible values are auto, none, verticaltree, horizontaltree, ## verticalflow, horizontalflow, organic, circle or a JSON string as used in Layout, Apply. ## Default is auto. # # layout: auto # ## ---- CSV below this line. First line are column names. ---- name,position,id,location,manager,email,fill,stroke,refs,url,image Evan Miller,CFO,emi,Office 1,,me@example.com,#dae8fc,#6c8ebf,,https://www.draw.io,https://cdn3.iconfinder.com/data/icons/user-avatars-1/512/users-9-2-128.png Edward Morrison,Brand Manager,emo,Office 2,Evan Miller,me@example.com,#d5e8d4,#82b366,,https://www.draw.io,https://cdn3.iconfinder.com/data/icons/user-avatars-1/512/users-10-3-128.png Ron Donovan,System Admin,rdo,Office 3,Evan Miller,me@example.com,#d5e8d4,#82b366,"emo,tva",https://www.draw.io,https://cdn3.iconfinder.com/data/icons/user-avatars-1/512/users-2-128.png Tessa Valet,HR Director,tva,Office 4,Evan Miller,me@example.com,#d5e8d4,#82b366,,https://www.draw.io,https://cdn3.iconfinder.com/data/icons/user-avatars-1/512/users-3-128.png

<mxGraphModel>
    <root>
        <mxCell id="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-0"/>
        <mxCell id="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-0"/>
        <mxCell id="qjMXR-8qFvfJkbGcyA1T-6" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=13;arcSize=50;fillColor=#CCFF99;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
            <mxGeometry y="558" width="1220" height="20" as="geometry"/>
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="locations_button" value="Locations" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=#676767;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
            <mxGeometry x="40" y="560" width="140" height="16" as="geometry"/>
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="qjMXR-8qFvfJkbGcyA1T-2" value="UCS Domain Overview" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=#0085FC;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
            <mxGeometry x="240" y="560" width="140" height="16" as="geometry"/>
        </mxCell>

        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="qjMXR-8qFvfJkbGcyA1T-4" value="UCS Chassis Traffic" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=#676767;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
            <mxGeometry x="640" y="560" width="140" height="16" as="geometry"/>
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="qjMXR-8qFvfJkbGcyA1T-5" value="Server Traffic" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=#676767;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
            <mxGeometry x="840" y="560" width="140" height="16" as="geometry"/>
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="locations" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=none;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
            <mxGeometry x="30" y="558" width="160" height="20" as="geometry"/>
        </mxCell>
        <UserObject label="" link="/d/Inte2EIWk/ucs-domain-overview" id="domain_overview">
            <mxCell style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=none;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
                <mxGeometry x="230" y="558" width="160" height="20" as="geometry"/>
            </mxCell>
        </UserObject>
        <UserObject label="" link="/d/W7LSukHWz/ucs-domain-traffic" id="domain_traffic">
            <mxCell style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=none;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
                <mxGeometry x="430" y="558" width="160" height="20" as="geometry"/>
            </mxCell>
        </UserObject>
        <UserObject label="" link="/d/KOM8ZHNWz/ucs-chassis-traffic" id="chassis">
            <mxCell style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=none;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
                <mxGeometry x="630" y="558" width="160" height="20" as="geometry"/>
            </mxCell>
        </UserObject>
        <UserObject label="" link="/d/Z0M_N1vWz/service-profile-stats" id="servers">
            <mxCell style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=none;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
                <mxGeometry x="830" y="558" width="160" height="20" as="geometry"/>
            </mxCell>
        </UserObject>
        <mxCell id="3TAq4FZGmTNtiptqA514-0" value="Congestion Monitoring" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=#676767;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
            <mxGeometry x="1040" y="560" width="140" height="16" as="geometry"/>
        </mxCell>
        <mxCell id="ingress_congestion" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=0;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#FFFFFF;fontSize=10;arcSize=50;fillColor=none;" parent="U3Yb-M3iW0U3TkC6f_VT-1" vertex="1">
            <mxGeometry x="1030" y="558" width="160" height="20" as="geometry"/>
        </mxCell>
    </root>
</mxGraphModel>

options.content: UCS Domain Overview - $domain

targets.query: SELECT last("name") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms
SELECT last("sys_uptime") AS "Uptime" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms

select sum(last) as "Memory" from (SELECT last("memory") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms GROUP BY domain,chassis,server,id) where time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms

select sum(last) as "#CPU" from (SELECT last("num_cpus") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms GROUP BY domain,chassis,server,id) where time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms

select sum(last) as "#Cores" from (SELECT last("num_cores") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms GROUP BY domain,chassis,server,id) where time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms

select count(id) AS "Blade Servers" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "type" = 'blade') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(id) AS "Rack Servers" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "type" = 'rack') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(id) AS "OK" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "oper_state" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

select count(id) AS "Other" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "oper_state" != 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),domain,chassis,server,id) where $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("ucsm_fw_ver") AS "UCSM version" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms

select location from (select location,last(model) from "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" where  ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms) where time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms

select sum(last) as "#vFC" from (SELECT last("num_vFCs") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms GROUP BY domain,chassis,server ,id) where time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms

select sum(last) as "#vEth" from (SELECT last("num_vEths") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms GROUP BY domain,chassis,server,id) where time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms

select sum(count) from (select count(distinct(chassis)) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND chassis!='') AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,id) group by domain) where time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms

targets.query: SELECT last("leadership") as "leadership" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'A') AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT last("leadership") as "leadership" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'B') AND $timeFilter

SELECT last("oob_if_ip") AS "OOB IP Address", last("serial") AS "Serial", last("model") AS "Model", last("fi_fw_sys_ver") AS "System version" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'A') AND time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms
SELECT last("load") AS "Load" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'A') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT last("total_memory")  as "Total" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /A/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("mem_available") as "Available"  FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /A/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (last("total_memory") - last("mem_available"))/last("total_memory")*100 FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /A/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (last("total_memory") - last("mem_available"))/last("total_memory")*100 FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /B/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_memory")  as "Total" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /B/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("mem_available") as "Available"  FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /B/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("load") AS "Load" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'B') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

SELECT last("oob_if_ip") AS "OOB IP Address", last("serial") AS "Serial", last("model") AS "Model", last("fi_fw_sys_ver") AS "System version" FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" = 'B') AND $timeFilter

select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' and "fi_id" =~ /A/) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' and "fi_id" =~ /B/) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "SFP not present" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'sfp-not-present' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) AS "Admin down" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "$db"."$rp"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'admin-down' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and  $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port) where  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT location as "Location", domain as "Domain",  chassis as "Chassis ID", id as "Server", model as "Model", serial as "Serial", num_cpus as "# CPU", num_cores as "# Cores", memory as "Memory", operability as "Operability", oper_state as "Operational State", oper_state_code, num_vEths as "# vEth", num_vFCs as "# vFC" FROM "$db"."$rp"."Servers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND  time > [[__to]]ms - [[5m_in_ms]]ms and time < [[__to]]ms GROUP BY "service_profile",domain,chassis,id order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: show tag values from "$db"."$rp"."FIEnvStats" with key=domain where $timeFilter
